rules.declarations:
transform: scale(1.1);
  transition: transform var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-out);

rules.selector:
/* Clases de utilidad para animaciones de entrada */
.slide-up
rules.declarations:
animation: slideUp var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-out-quart);
  animation-fill-mode: both;

rules.selector:
/* Clases de utilidad para animaciones de salida */
.fade-out
rules.declarations:
animation: fadeOut var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-in);
  animation-fill-mode: forwards;

animation: slideUpOut var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-in);
  animation-fill-mode: forwards;

animation: scaleOut var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-in);
  animation-fill-mode: forwards;

rules.selector:
/* Hover Glow - Efecto de brillo al hover */
.hover-glow

/* Click Pulse - Efecto de pulso al click */
.click-pulse:active

/* Hover lift mejorado con transiciones suaves (Fase 1) */
.route-card:hover

/* Estado seleccionado para cards con border glow mejorado (Fase 1) */
.route-card.selected

/* ==========================================
   FASE 3: ANIMACIONES DE ENTRADA/SALIDA
   Card Expand con Height Transition
   ========================================== */
.route-card.expanded

rules.declarations:
backface-visibility: hidden;
  transition: transform var(--duration-slow) var(--ease-out);

border-color: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.3);
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1) 0%, rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.5) 100%);

rules.selector:
/* @keyframes pulseGlow - DEFINIDO EN SECCIÓN DE ANIMACIONES CONSOLIDADAS */

.card-body

/* Clases legacy de calculadora eliminadas: .calculation-box-enhanced, .calculation-header,
   .calculation-icon, .calculation-flow, .calc-step, .calc-step-number, .calc-step-content,
   .calc-arrow, .calc-fees-summary, .calculation-result, .result-icon, .result-content,
   .result-label, .result-value, .result-percentage, .calculation-note-enhanced, .note-icon,
   .important-considerations, .considerations-header, .considerations-list, .consideration-item,
   .item-icon, .item-content (no se usan en templates actuales) */

/* Las clases .calc-label, .calc-value, .calc-fee SÍ se usan: */
.calc-label

/* Click scale en botones de filtro (Fase 1) */
.filter-btn:active
rules.declarations:
transform: scale(0.97);
  transition: transform var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-in);

rules.selector:
/* Botones de filtro para operaciones crypto */
.filter-btn-operation

/* @keyframes pulse - DEFINIDO EN SECCIÓN DE ANIMACIONES CONSOLIDADAS */

.warning-banner.stale-data

/* ==========================================
   FASE 3: ANIMACIONES DE ENTRADA/SALIDA
   Toast Notifications
   ========================================== */
.toast-container

/* @keyframes panelSlideDown - Usar slideDown (DEFINIDO EN SECCIÓN DE ANIMACIONES CONSOLIDADAS) */

.filters-panel-header

/* SECCIÓN ELIMINADA: btn-primary, btn-success, btn-warning, btn-error, btn-neutral,
   btn-outline, btn-sm, btn-lg, badge, badge-success, badge-warning, badge-error,
   badge-info, animate-fade-in, animate-slide-in, animate-pulse (no usadas) */

/* ============================================
   ESTILOS PARA PESTAÑA DE EXCHANGES v5.0.75
   ============================================ */

.exchange-filters

rules.declarations:
background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.1) 0%, rgba(5, 150, 105, 0.15) 100%);
  border: 1px solid rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.2);

background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.1) 0%, rgba(109, 40, 217, 0.15) 100%);
  border: 1px solid rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.2);
/* Hereda todos los estilos de .route-card definido en línea 978 */

rules.selector:
/* Variantes específicas de profit para crypto */
.crypto-route-card.profit-high::before

/* Magnetic Buttons - Botones que siguen el cursor */
.magnetic

/* Icon Spin - Rotación completa al hover */
.icon-spin-hover:hover .icon

/* Bounce Effect - Rebote sutil al hover */
.bounce-hover

/* Progress Ring - Anillo de progreso circular */
.progress-ring

rules.declarations:
display: inline-block;
  transition: all var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-out);

rules.selector:
/* Glow Effect - Efecto de brillo pulsante */
.glow-pulse

/* Shimmer Effect - Efecto de brillo deslizante */
.shimmer-effect

/* Elastic Button - Botón con efecto elástico */
.elastic-button

rules.declarations:
transform: scale(0.95);
  transition: transform var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-in);

rules.selector:
/* Fade Scale on Hover - Desvanecimiento y escala */
.fade-scale-hover

rules.declarations:
transform-style: preserve-3d;
  transition: transform var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-out);

rules.selector:
/* Elementos con peso visual extra fuerte */
.weight-bold

/* Tarjetas de ruta con jerarquía visual mejorada */
.route-card .route-name

/* Asegurar contraste mínimo de 4.5:1 para texto */
.text-primary

/* Fondo de tarjetas con mejor contraste */
.route-card

/* Tab Content Switch - Cambio de tab */
.tab-content-switch

/* Animación pulse infinita para el status dot */
.status-dot::before

rules.declarations: display: none; /* Ocultar en móviles pequeños */
